<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

This archetype shows a set of orthogonal coordinate axes such as for representing a transform.

## Components

**Optional**: [`AxisLength`](../components/axis_length.md)

## Shown in
* [Spatial3D](../views/spatial3d.md)
* [Spatial2DView](../views/spatial2d_view.md) (if logged above active projection)
